understanding.developer_understanding_on_unclear_metho: The unclear code is about optimizing expressions and preserving aliases in a list of expressions.
understanding.developer_understanding_on_unclear_code_: The unclear code is related to optimizing expressions in a query, which is part of the process for optimizing distinct queries based on certain conditions specified in the configuration description.

config_description:
/** * Database setting OPTIMIZE_DISTINCT (default: true). * . The optimization is used if: *
  • The select is a single column query without condition
    • *
  • The query contains only one table, and no group by
    • *
  • There is only one table involved
    • *
  • There is an ascending index on the column
    • *
  • The selectivity of the column is below 20
    • * */
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration OPTIMIZE_DISTINCT is used to optimize distinct queries in the code. It checks for specific conditions such as single column query without conditions, one table involved, ascending index on the column, and selectivity below 20 to trigger the optimization.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration OPTIMIZE_DISTINCT is triggered when distinct queries meet the specified conditions mentioned in the code. The frequency of triggering depends on the occurrence of distinct queries that satisfy the optimization criteria.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the OPTIMIZE_DISTINCT configuration option is to improve the performance of distinct queries by utilizing the optimization logic. It reduces the processing time and resource consumption for qualifying distinct queries that meet the optimization criteria.
